value.string: "Short Description:" tag marks the start of a new message. Can be used as a differentiator between two messages in a single file.
"Long Description:"/"Long_Description:" marks start of long description. All lines after it are to be included in long description.

value.expression: Downloading error message files from network location:" $sNetworkDrive$".
